title: Tasker 6.0.1 beta improves Tasky accessibility and performance, adds new features
content:
After launching the simplified Tasky in the previous update, Tasker 6.0.1 beta is now tweaking the feature while adding some new automation options for longtime users.

description: Tasker 6.0.1 beta is now tweaking the new Tasky feature while adding some new automation options for longtime users.
